desc: Fox One Brewing. Local crafted beer from the vallys of South Wales that make you Bright eyed and Bushy tailed. Take a trip into the world of amazing beer with our Fox One mascots.

layout.text: Bright eyed, Bushy tailed, Craft beer.
At Fox One Brewing we are not just another brewery. Born in the wind and rain of South Wales we stand for characteristic, great tasting beer. This is our take on world defining craft beer!
